name: Save the planet (itch)
description:
Your goal is to create settlements for people to live while at the same time keeping the planets ecosystem in an equilibrium. 

On the randomly generated playfield, you will be able to build an Energy Plant (Alphanumeric Key 1), a Village (Alphanumeric Key 2) and a Water and Air cleaning facility (Alphanumeric Key 3). Simply select the structure to build and then click on an empty field to build it.

Depending on the structure, it will consume energy to build, as well as influence energy production and pollute or clean air and water.

All assets, code and sounds were created during this Game Jam (48 hours).
